title: Give us an Option to Turn Off Chat
body:
With the amount of pings and information you can give to team mates via pings etc, why can't we have the option to turn off chat rather than having to mute people each game?

It's kind of silly that you can enter a game and mute every single player yet it's not a standard option you can turn off and on.

Not only that the amount of people reporting one another for absolutely nothing as insane!

For example, my last game we had an amumu jungle constantly pushing in top lane denying nasus farm. I said and I quote "you should leave the farm for nasus". Oh well I guess I hit a sore point because he goes off the rails and afterwards reports me for verbal abuse and apparently being toxic.

Honestly I come across this same attitude in a lot of games. You make one simple comment on something and next minute everyone wants to report you. Then you get people jumping on the bandwagon because you're losing and feel the need to take it out on someone via reports etc.

If we could just have an option to take away the chat then it wouldn't be an issue full stop.

replies.body: drag chat of the screen, you don't need it at all to win games
